comments.body: Quote from: Ivekzg on July 10, 2022, 04:51:03 PMPrepaid SIM Cards issued in EU, Croatia.Sim cards are brand new.Providers are T-mobile, A1, Telemach (+385).Sim cards come with 3e topping included in price.I can top up sim cards online if needed.Bulk orders available.Prices depands on quantity.Feel free to contact me about prices and shipping.Does it come with internet and how much GB/month? Or is it only for SMS/CALLS
